column5: 4 bedroom, 3 bath newly remodeled waterfront lake house with large covered porch and covered 2 car carport. Bedrooms include 1 king with a master bath attached. 1 bedroom with a queen size bed, 1 bedroom with a full size bed, 1 bedroom with twin beds. Large private open area to swim and docks to fish off of just feet from the porch. Large smoker in the back to smoke as much meat as you can dream of.
